org.polarsys.chess.core.views

Class DiagramStatus.DesignView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.polarsys.chess.core.views.DiagramStatus.DesignView
  • Enclosing class:
    DiagramStatus

    public static class DiagramStatus.DesignView
extends java.lang.Object
    The DesignView must be treated as a singleton service class. It is an integral part of DiagramStatus service.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the names of the active design views. If more that one design view is active then this method concatenates the names.
        Returns:
        the resulting name.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled(java.lang.String view)
        Checks is a view is enabled by providing its name.
        Parameters:
        view - the view name
        Returns:
        true if it is enable

      • getCurrentDiagramName

        public java.lang.String getCurrentDiagramName()
        Returns the current active diagram name.
        Returns:
        the name of the active diagram

      • getEnabledPermissions

        public PermissionList getEnabledPermissions(org.polarsys.chess.chessmlprofile.Core.Domain theDomain)
        Returns all the enabled permissions based on the enabled views.
        Parameters:
        theDomain - the the domain
        Returns:
        the PermissionList with all the enabled permissions

      • getEnabledPermissions

        public PermissionList getEnabledPermissions(java.lang.String viewName,
                                            org.polarsys.chess.chessmlprofile.Core.Domain theDomain)
        Returns all the enabled permissions based on the given view.
        Parameters:
        viewName - the view name
        theDomain - the the domain
        Returns:
        the PermissionList with all the enabled permissions

      • isDiagramAllowed

        public boolean isDiagramAllowed(org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.notation.Diagram diagram)
        Checks if the diagram passed as a parameter is allowed in the enabled views. A diagram is allowed in a view if that view contains a permissions list for the diagram.
        Parameters:
        diagram - the diagram
        Returns:
        true if the diagram is allowed
